## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                       | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `external` | `external` | Is the linked ressource external? | `boolean` | `false` |
| `href`     | `href`     | What do you want to link?         | `string`  | `'#'`   |
